context_bundle.summary: Internal Developer Platform design covers the architecture and principles for building platforms that enhance developer productivity

onboarding.quick_start: docker run --name backstage -p 7000:7000 backstage backstage start --config app-config.local.yaml
common_patterns: Platform catalog: 'apiVersion: backstage.io/v1alpha1 kind: Component' for service registration
Software templates: 'scaffolder.local' with 'apiVersion: scaffolder.backstage.io/v1beta3 kind: Template'
Developer portal: 'organization: domain: example.com name: Acme Corp' for organization configuration
Tech docs: 'mkdocs.yml' in repositories with 'backstage.io/techdocs-ref' annotations
Plugin architecture: 'packages/app/src/plugins.ts' for plugin registration and configuration
known_errors: 404 on catalog: 'curl http://localhost:7000/api/catalog/entities' and verify location configuration
Template not rendering: 'yarn backstage-cli repo build' and check template schema validation
Tech docs failing: 'mkdocs build' to verify docs configuration before backstage ingestion
Plugin not loading: 'yarn install' and restart development server after plugin installation
